timeline.message:
bndlib: Optimizations for methods escaping characters in strings

Signed-off-by: BJ Hargrave <bj@bjhargrave.com>

capreq: Improvements to capability and requirement impls

Signed-off-by: BJ Hargrave <bj@bjhargrave.com>

version: Handle empty String qualifier

Signed-off-by: BJ Hargrave <bj@bjhargrave.com>

indexing: Improve indexing code

We now also collect attributes from BSN into identity cap and collect
directives and attributes from BSN into bundle and host caps.

Recent OSGi EG meetings pointed out we were failing to include these
directives and attributes in the generated index.

There also changes which should hopefully improve indexing performance.

Signed-off-by: BJ Hargrave <bj@bjhargrave.com>

timeline.bodyText: Why did you change the return type?
timeline.author: pkriens

replies.bodyText: I split the method in two. One part handles computing the type and modifying the type map and the other part modifies the map map.
replies.author: bjhargrave

timeline.bodyText: If you're going to uglify the code all over the place, should you not at least move this into a central method? Repeating this low level checks all over the place is error prone.
timeline.author: pkriens
